enhanced_by.reason: Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, making them suitable for setting up similar test scenarios.
Both methods involve filtering elements based on a condition, which can be used to set up similar test conditions.
The assertion for retainAll can be enhanced by verifying that the remaining elements in the collection are those that were retained, similar to how containsAll verifies the presence of all elements.
After retainAll, the collection is reindexed, similar to other methods that modify the collection. This can be used to verify the state of the index after the operation.
